titles.title: A bill to exempt certain educational institutions from user fees on permits for industrial use of specially denatured distilled spirits.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 4/11/1988--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt certain academic institutions and scientific research institutions from the $250 user fee (occupational tax) in connection with permits for research uses of specially denatured distilled spirits.
